item.title: reshape
item.description: 1. reshape a data frame from wide format to long format d1 <- data.frame(subject = c("id1", "id2"), x0 = c("male", "female"), x1_2000 = 1:2, x1_2005 = 5:6, x2_2000 = 1:2, x2_2005 = 5:6 ) d1 ## subject x0 x1_2000 x1_2005 x2_2000 x2_2005 ## 1 id1 male 1 5 1 5 ## 2 id2 female 2 6 2 6 rs1 <- reshape(d1, dir = "long", varying = 3:6, sep = "_") rs1 ## subject x0 time x1 x2 id ## 1.
